title: Swordbattle.io
description: Swordbattle.io is an online sword fighting io game! Fight with friends and enemies in this multiplayer battle arena! Collect coins to be huge, rule the land

title: Krunker.io
description: A fast-paced first-person shooter with various game modes and customizable characters.

title: Diep.io
description: A fun and challenging test game.

title: Venge.io
description: A fun and challenging test game.

title: Skribbl.io
description: A fun and challenging test game.

title: Tetr.io
description: A fun and challenging test game.

title: Shell Shockers
description: The classic platformer that started it all! Jump, run, and collect coins as you navigate through the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.

title: Skillfite.io
description: The iconic puzzle game where you have to strategically fit falling blocks into a grid.  A timeless classic that's easy to learn but hard to master.

title: Realmz.io
description: A classic arcade game where you control Pac-Man and eat dots while avoiding ghosts.  Can you collect all the points and escape the maze?

title: Cryzen.io
description: A groundbreaking shooter game where you defend your base from waves of invading aliens.  Shoot accurately to survive and protect the Earth!

title: Gartic Phone
description: A fast-paced platformer where you control Sonic, the blue blur, as he runs through levels and collects rings.  Can you defeat Dr. Robotnik and save the world?

title: Kirka.io
description: An adventure game where you explore Hyrule, solve puzzles, and battle enemies to rescue Princess Zelda.  A classic RPG that revolutionized the genre.

title: Mine-craft.io
description: A legendary fighting game where you choose your favorite character and battle against others in one-on-one combat.  A true test of skill and strategy.

title: Carball.io
description: A classic arcade game where you control Mario and climb ladders to rescue Pauline from Donkey Kong.  A challenging platformer that requires quick reflexes.

title: Lurkers.io
description: A life simulation game where you create and control the lives of virtual people.  Build houses, choose careers, and experience the ups and downs of everyday life.

title: Eaglercraft
description: A sandbox game where you can build anything you can imagine using blocks.  Explore, craft, and survive in a vast world filled with possibilities.

title: Gartic.io
description: An open-world action-adventure game set in Los Santos.  Explore the city, engage in missions, and experience the criminal underworld.

title: Mope.io
description: A first-person shooter game with realistic graphics and intense gameplay.  Engage in online multiplayer battles and experience thrilling single-player campaigns.

title: MooMoo.io
description: MooMoo.io is a challenging .io game about gathering resources and building a village. Hit trees and rocks to collect wood and stones. You can use those resources to build walls and windmills.

title: Paper.io
description: A social deduction game where you try to figure out who the imposter is among a crew of astronauts.  Communicate with your crewmates, complete tasks, and survive!
